Reviews.Title: Mighty Mule security cameras
Reviews.Author: Eyeguy
Reviews.Content: This system is great.  The instruction manuals could be a little better, but regardless it was very easy to install and I am far from being an electronics expert.  The images are clear.  Being able to monitor online and on the phone gives peace of mind when away from home.  It is also nice to be able to check who has pulled into the driveway at the side of the house.

ProductInfo.Features:
Professional grade 4-Channel CCTV DVR with H.264 compression technology and 1TB hard drive for maximum storage!
Durable 600 TVL high-resolution, color, security cameras with IP66 weatherproof rating.
Professional grade indoor/outdoor bullet cameras with 100 ft. cables feature 65 ft. night vision, 20 IR LEDs, and IR Cut filter.
Do-it-yourself installation and monitoring; view your surveillance system on your smart phone or via the internet on your PC.
Generous Two-Year Warranty and free US-based Lifetime Technical Support.
ProductInfo.Name: Mighty Mule LX-4PROPK35SC-TB 4 Channel DVR with 4 Hi-res 600TVL, IR Night Vision Bullet Cameras and 1TB Hard Drive. Smartphone viewing.
